name: Make The Perfect Tea
description:
A fun game for 2 people who are bored. The game is about making tea and sabotaging others. You could make the tea spicy, buttery and citrusy. Only for 2 people.

How to play:

Bored Person Number 1's turn is first, Bored Person Number 2 must be blindfolded or must look away. Bored Person Number 1 can choose up to 3 condiments. If the condiment number is a positive number then it means it adds up to your score. If the condiment number is a negative number then it means that it will reduce to Bored Person Number 2's score. If you are done picking your condiments then you must press next then its Bored Person Number 2's turn and Bored Person Number 1 must be blindfolded or look away. Who has the highest score wins.
